src_original: na tathā ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ saṃdarśanena bhagavataḥ pūjā kṛtā bhavati yathātmabhāvaparityāgeneti //
tgt_original: 我雖以神力供養於佛。 不如以身供養。

src_original: tataḥ sa dvādaśavarṣāṇām atyayāt taṃ svam ātmabhāvaṃ divyavastraiḥ pariveṣṭya gandhatailaplutaṃ
tgt_original: 滿千二百歲已。 香油塗身。

src_original: atha khalu tasya bodhisattvasya tābhiḥ kāyapradīpamuktajvalāprabhābhir aśītigaṅgānadīvālukāsamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan //
tgt_original: 以神通力而自然身。 光明遍照八十億殑伽河沙世界。

src_original: teṣu lokadhātuṣv aśītigaṅgānadīvālukāsamās tathāgatāḥ sādhukāraṃ dadanti sma //
sādhu sādhu kulaputra paramaduṣkara bodhisattvānāṃ vīryārambha bhūtā tathāgatapūjā dharmapūjā / tathā
tgt_original: 善哉善哉。 是名真精進。

src_original: tena samayena sarvasattvāpriyadarśano nāma bodhisattvasyātmabhāvadīpyamānasya dvādaśavarṣasahasrāṇām atyayena praśānto 'bhūt //
